descriptionHtml: I vibe coded a Python script to implement a docs-as-code approach to updating my résumé. The script parses a YAML file and renders it into HTML and PDF formats. It also includes a watcher script for live render previews in a browser.

title: Expand FedRAMP integrations
descriptionHtml:
On the CASB integrations page (https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/applications/scan-apps/casb-integrations/), we list available CASB integrations.

For Gartner MQ survey, we expanded the set of supported integrations documented by adding FedRAMP variants for:

  • ServiceNow
  • Google Workspace (and subpages)
  • Microsoft 365 (and subpages)

title: Secure Internet Traffic network policies API and Terraform
descriptionHtml:
[tcerqueira] is in the process of adding API examples to the Secure your Internet Traffic learning path to reach parity with the UI examples.

PR: https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-docs/pull/18388

title: CDS UI updates and AWS CDE
descriptionHtml: Providing customers with a way to scan content stored in AWS S3 buckets for sensitive data matches via Cloud Data Extraction (CDE).

title: Per-account certificates change management
descriptionHtml: Following the expiration of the global Cloudflare root certificate, the Gateway team implemented a new process that requires every Zero Trust user to generate and deploy a certificate unique to their account. I was responsible for change management in the docs, writing docs to describe the new process and clearly communicating to Enterprise users the changes that would occur upon certificate expiration.

title: Hugo to Starlight migration
descriptionHtml: Assisted Content Engineering team in migrating the Cloudflare Docs site from the Hugo static site generator to Starlight, a modern documentation framework for Astro. This work involved making decisions about the site's information architecture, updating the styling, and porting Hugo components to JSX.

title: Rework tenant control policy
descriptionHtml:
Customer reported that the example in the public docs was not working:

https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/gateway/http-policies/tenant-control/#add-custom-headers-for-a-saas-application

We found an internal document that explained how this should work, and the customer confirmed it worked after implementing it:

https://wiki.cfdata.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=730367397

Updated the public documentation to show the additional rule needed to make this work.

title: CLUE Index front-end
descriptionHtml: Implemented HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for front-end of internal tool based on designs from UX Content Strategy team. The PCX CLUE (Content Legibility for User Ease) Index is an internal tool used to help stakeholders evaluate their contributions to docs, UI, API, and email content based on best practices and our internal style guide.

title: Secure your Internet traffic and SaaS apps
descriptionHtml:
Created a learning path for the second module of the Zero Trust Implementation Guide plan.

PR: https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-docs/pull/12460/

title: UI elements style guide
descriptionHtml:
Moved the internal wiki page describing our UI elements into the public-facing style guide.

Adapted the existing Symbols in UI element names page by moving each header down a level and creating a new section to accommodate general UI element concerns.

title: Risk scoring
descriptionHtml: Drafting docs here.

title: Gateway precedence diagram
descriptionHtml: Added a Mermaid diagram to the developer docs to illustrate how traffic is intercepted, proxied, and filtered from onboarding to egressing to the Internet.

title: Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) docs revamp
descriptionHtml: I unified 20+ pages for our Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB)'s third-party SaaS integrations to follow a consistent information architecture. Previously, these pages were inconsistent in presenting how CASB scans for misconfigurations and security issues. This issue was especially critical for our Enterprise customers, who must implement CASB to meet compliance requirements. This docs update increased our ratings in independent consultant reviews and directly helped close a contract with a Fortune 500 customer.

title: WARP client certificate third-party installations
descriptionHtml: I maintain the docs page for installing the Cloudflare certificate required by the WARP client to intercept and filter traffic. This work involves testing and documenting how to install certificates to various operating systems, desktop programs, and SaaS apps.

title: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) docs revamp
descriptionHtml: I maintain the documentation for Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention (DLP). When we released predefined entries for DLP profiles (which adds the ability to detect known patterns in your Zero Trust organization's traffic, such as SSNs and credit card numbers), I restructured the DLP docs to guide users through a more logical workflow.

title: Zero Trust-core dashboard merge
descriptionHtml: To consolidate the Cloudflare user experience, we merged the "core" (dash.cloudflare.com) and Zero Trust (dash.teams.cloudflare.com) dashboard experiences to link between each other more seamlessly. I led the effort to update all of our Zero Trust docs instructions to reflect the new user flow and improve feature discoverability.

title: Studyfinder
descriptionHtml: Worked in a team of 5 to conceptualize and prototype an app to help students find and rate study spaces on campus. Watch our problem space video.

title: Docs Overview page redesign
descriptionHtml: Implemented HTML components for site builder (Hugo) to organize all product landing pages. We designed this template to serve as a "nutrition label" for each Cloudflare product. I programmed the components to be flexible and extensible without cluttering Markdown code.

title: Argo Smart Routing docs
descriptionHtml: Authored new documentation for Argo Smart Routing by combining information from multiple different sources across the Cloudflare documentation. This new page acts as a single point-of-presence for Argo documentation for over three million monthly users.

title: Drops

title: Pitt School of Education Heuristic UX Evaluation report
descriptionHtml: Final group project evaluating the user experience of the University of Pittsburgh School of Education admissions site. My team consulted with the Pitt School of Education's site team to identify pain points, ran research with potential users of the site, and presented final findings and recommendations to the client.
